abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: TaxonKey: Aepyceros melampus (Lichtenstein, 1812) HasCoordinate: TRUE The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from NYSM Mammals 1 records from TTU Mammals Collection 1 records from Mammifères (sauf Chiroptères) du Muséum d'Histoire Naturelle de la ville de Bourges (BOUM) 1 records from UTEP Mammals (Arctos) 1 records from Mammalogy Collection - Royal Ontario Museum 1 records from BoBO - Botanic Garden and Botanical Museum Berlin-Dahlem Observations 1 records from Natusfera Citizen Science Observation Dataset 1 records from Anymals+plants - Citizen Science Data 1 records from Canadian Museum of Nature Mammal Collection 1 records from Mammal collection, Natural History Museum, University of Oslo 1 records from Museu de Ciències Naturals de Barcelona: MCNB-Cord 1 records from SBMNH Vertebrate Zoology 2 records from Vertebrate Zoology Division - Mammalogy, Yale Peabody Museum 2 records from AMNH Mammal Collections 2 records from MSU Mammalogy, Ornithology and Vertebrate Paleontology Collections 2 records from Lund Museum of Zoology (MZLU) 3 records from RBINS DaRWIN 3 records from NMNH Extant Specimen Records 3 records from Animal observations 3 records from UAZ Mammals 3 records from MVZ Mammal Collection (Arctos) 3 records from University of Michigan Museum of Zoology, Division of Mammals 4 records from Macaulay Library Audio and Video Collection 5 records from KUBI Mammalogy Collection 7 records from Hatikka Observation Database 8 records from LACM Vertebrate Collection 9 records from Mammals housed at MHNG, Geneva 13 records from CAS Mammalogy (MAM) 14 records from MSB Mammal Collection (Arctos) 14 records from DMNS Mammal Collection (Arctos) 15 records from Museum of Comparative Zoology, Harvard University 28 records from Kenya Virtual Museum Records 44 records from Field Museum of Natural History (Zoology) Mammal Collection 54 records from Levantamento de Mamíferos do Parque Nacional da Quiçama - INBAC/RWCP - 2017 70 records from Paleobiology Database 70 records from Paleobiology Database 158 records from Ground Census Data for Lake Nakuru and Nairobi National Parks 171 records from Kenya Wildlife Service, Laikipia Samburu Aerial Census, 2008 187 records from Bibliographic records of Angola mammals 299 records from Kenya Wildlife Service, Laikipia Samburu Aerial Census, 2012 398 records from naturgucker 832 records from Large herbivores in African savannahs, Lake Mburo National Park, Uganda 1129 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations
